short_summary: Procurement of electric forklifts and ancillary items.
description: Procurement of electric forklifts and ancillary items for the Department of National Defence.
full_summary:
## Solicitation for Electric Forklift Purchase
### Announcement End Date
*The solicitation for the electric forklift purchase is closed.*

***Procurement Details*** 

* **Requisition Number:** cb-6272-136018
* **Mandatory CANDAD ID:** W8476-236678/A
* **Issue Date:** 2023-06-14
* **Close Date:** 2023-07-05T14:00:00

***Procurement Description:*** 

The Department of National Defense is seeking bids to purchase five (5) electric forklifts and ancillary items as described in [Annex A – Pricing] and [Annex B – Requirement]. The electric forklifts are to be delivered within 120 days.

***Supplier Eligibility*** 

To participate in this solicitation, suppliers must be registered under the Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) E60HS-21FRKL/A. Suppliers who are not registered can pre-qualify at [Canada Buys Canada Canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities/tender-notice/pw-hs-653-79868).

***Procurement Method and Evaluation Criteria*** 

This procurement is in accordance with the government’s procurement regulations and guidelines. Evaluation of bids will be based on the [Lowest Price] criteria. Bids may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

***Contact Information*** 

* **Name:** Victor Shepstone
* **Email:** victor.shepstone@forces.gc.ca
* **Phone:** (819) 939-3040

Please note that all bids are to be submitted to the contracting authority.
